评论详情: Unfortunately I misplaced the package and missed the return ability. Months later I decided to throw in the wash and went to remove the paper tags. I realized the brand tag at the neck was sewn externally. I then discovered the care label was also external. I reached out to Amazon chat and a phone call for a possible courtesy return still. Chat was willing to help but they couldn’t get the label to work so I was transferred to a call. That rep didn’t understand I guess this won’t be restockable to sell because it’s got flaws. I had to pay a restock fee which was deducted from my return. I’ll probably see it at my local liquidator store in a few months…..🙄
This has quickly become one of my favorite comfy sweaters. It's a heavy quality, warm yet not bulky fit. I've gotten several compliments on this sweater.
The fabric is thick and soft. It’s so warm. I love this top with jeans or leggings! It’s great for a cold day!
The seater is well made, medium weight, great style, sizing is spot on. I got several compliments.
I like everything about it, but it runs big and is a bit baggy. I thought it would shrink, but it didn't.

Love the fabric and how this sweater looks and feels. Nice quality and would purchase again.

So soft & comfortable; the fit was accurate and the quality seems good.  It barely covers the waist and when I lift my arms it shows my belly so I wear a shirt under it, just my preference.  I wish it was a little longer, it's not as long as it shows in the photo which is why I subtracted a star.  I've only worn it once, but I think it's going to be a favorite. Love the weight of this sweater...a bit on the heavy side but just right, warm and cozy.  I'm an 8-10 and the S was just right.
This sweater is great! Nice feeling material, not thin but not overly thick. I typically wear a large because I like a looser fit. This is a large. I am 5'6" and 165lbs for reference.

I LOVE the way this sweater looks and feels!!! You can wear this for so many different occasions! The neck is tighter fitting than the model, I can assure you there. That is the only difference in design that I noticed. I like the feel of the material, the way this sweater sits, and it's stretch! Again, the neck is tighter than the models show. If you can't tell by my photos, you will notice it when you wear it. The price at the time of this review was $23.79, and it is not terrible. It lost a start because of the neck being tighter than I wanted, but I still like the sweater all the same.

The sweater is super soft and cozy and the first day I wore it I wanted it in all the colors. At the end of the day I had 3-4 pics in the front of the sweater from normal wear. The fabric is very soft and the sweater itself is very cute. If you have a longer torso or prefer shirts to be longer, this is not the sweater for you. This sweater is so soft and the colors are very vibrant!
Love the feel of the material. It’s so soft & cozy! Fits true to size and washes well. I hung dry it and it held up great. Would purchase it again 😄

They sewed the sweater wrong. The inseams  on the neckline were attached to the “body” of the sweater the wrong way. I love how soft this is. Everything was true to description: fit, color.  I did return it only because the color wasn’t exactly what I wanted (trying to match my kids school green). Otherwise I would have kept it.
I LOVE this sweater! It is so soft and unbelievably comfortable. 5’6 200lb orders XL fits loose and perfect!

Ordered for / reviewed by wife…. I am typically a size large, so when I saw oversized, I still ordered a size large and I was pleasantly surprised. It’s quite a warm sweater, so I can’t wear it here in Texas yet, but it’s very stylish and true to the picture. I like the sleeves are tight around the wrist but not uncomfortable. It’s a true oversize fit and I think looks flattering with leggings or could be worn with jeans or work slacks.

评论概述: Fresh but not too trendy, great casual weekend sweater.
评论详情: This sweater is sooooo comfortable and the knitwear quality feels excellent. It's a synthetic but I'm happy to say the viscose feels much softer and cozier than a typical poly blend! Really warm and just feels thick and wonderful. Perfect for fall weather.  Style-wise I think it leans a little younger than most classic crewnecks, which maybe won't be right for everyone but feels PERFECT for my vibe. The stripes feel timeless but I like that the "inside out" seam details create a less preppy and more fashion-forward feeling. I love feeling pulled together but not stuck up and this sweater catches that effortless-but-polished thing. The boxy and roomy fit give it a "boyfriend sweater" feeling but with a modern edge, so it's really easy to style.  The yellow stripes on the green-and-yellow sweater are a warm and vibrant golden yellow. I think it's an awesome color combo. It's kind of tricky finding stripes that read as lively and fresh without being garish, but this can actually stand up to the contrast of my bright ginger hair without washing me out!  Distinctive but not too trendy, and nobody I know has one quite like it. This is absolutely gonna be a signature piece for me this autumn.

Very comfy. Fit is as expected but keep in mind it is meant to be an oversized sweater, so it's meant to be roomy. Basic knit sweater material and very comfy. Will be nice and warm for fall/winter. Plus it offers cute color combos!! I got the dark blue and teal ish color sweater and it's really adorable! It's been pretty chilly this summer in the evenings and I've with mine around the fire several times!! Loving it!!

评论概述: Cozy and Stylish Striped Sweater with a Perfect Oversized Fit
评论详情: I recently ordered the Striped Sweater in size medium. For reference, I'm 5'2" tall and about 140lbs. The sweater boasts a beautifully oversized design that maintains its shape while offering a cozy fit. The colors are vibrant and just as pictured, adding a stylish touch to any outfit.  Made from 100% synthetic materials, this sweater is soft and comfortable to wear. It features a high crewneck collar and long sleeves that provide extra warmth, making it ideal for cooler days. It very much looks like something from Free People.  It arrived without any unpleasant odors, which is always a plus!  Overall, this sweater is a fantastic blend of style and comfort. It’s medium-weight, warm, and perfect for layering or wearing on its own. I'm looking forward to wearing this during the cooler months.

I've been meaning to snap a picture of this sweater to show the color but in what must be a sign of the end of the world Central Texas has had clouds and rain for the last 10 days and I just can't get an image in real light.  So, I'll tell you. This is very nicely made and I know I'm going to wear it a LOT this winter. I was hoping it would have a little more of a cream color than a white color but I would say it is just a tad bit over white. Maybe some would call it "winter white" or maybe Breyer's Ice Cream Vanilla. I don't look good in bright white and this isn't bright white. I guess all that doesn't matter because I may be the most picky white wearer ever but it's so hard to know what color you are really going to get when you order online. It's good. Made very well and nice medium weight. Has a substantial feel and will look great with jeans and some loafers. Maybe a kicky scarf around your neck.

I am a stripe girl and love wearing them. This is a nice quality sweater that will get wear in the fall and winter months for sure. It's thick enough you don't need to layer it, but will still fit under a coat or jacket if needed.  The color (apricot with black stripes) is as pictured and it hits just below waist line and fits as expected.
I got this for wearing to my office this winter.  It fits true to size, feels warm and soft, and looks very attractive.

I love a good oversized sweater for the fall and winter. Even though this is slightly thick, it's not overly heavy. It is soft and gives you that cozy fall feeling, if that makes sense. It makes you wish for snow and fireplaces even in this 90 degree heat.  It may be a little boxy, but it is an oversized sweater and perfect for wearing over a tank or turtleneck in the colder weather. The cream color is very classic and perfect to add to your winter wardrobe. Wear this to work, date night or just out and about for errands in those chilly winter days.

I really like the softness and feel of this baby pink and white horizontal striped sweater. It has the outside seems meaning it is sewn on the outside for a rough edge hem. Has an oversize look with a wide body and lots and lots of stretch. Crew neck collar makes this a good sweater to throw on over a tshirt or wear as is for dressier occasions. Short enough to wear untucked or half tucked. I am a size XL or size 16 and ordered a size XL. This XL would fit up to a plus size woman who wears up to 2X in this XL. I could of easily sized down one And it still have plenty of room.

评论概述: Don't care for the casual outside seams
评论详情: This sweater is interesting.  It states is has casual outside seams, which I am not opposed to However, this sweater just didn't seem to be the right type for that kind of stitching. It is a baggy sweater, which is fine, the length was good, but the sleeves were a bit too long for my liking.  The outside seams did not seem to be sewn together very well, and one of the sleeves, where they attach to the sweater had a slight hole in it from poor stitching. The neck was not smooth and also seemed to have some sewing glitches in it. They weren't horrible, but they just take away from the look.  I give this sweater three stars. It is fine to wear out to run errands, but I wouldn't wear it to work or some sort of occasion with others.

评论概述: Slightly boxy/baggy, otherwise I love it!
评论详情: I do really like this sweater! It's soft, and I like the color. I wouldn't call it beige like the description says, it's more of an off-white, but it looks like the photos and the off-white is the color I really wanted, so I'm happy with it! It can go with nearly any color of pants. Yes, a lot of the seams are on the outside, and this is on purpose! You can see it on the product photos, and it's the style. It is not sewn wrong! If you don't like that style, don't purchase this. I have another sweater from a different brand that is a very similar style, and I prefer this new one more. Cons - This sweater is a little cropped, and I wish it was a tad longer. It's also somewhat boxy in the body and baggy in the arms, again, this is the style. I don't think it looks bad, but I would prefer it to be a bit less boxy and slightly less baggy sleeves. I ordered my normal size, and I'd say it fits mostly true to size other than being a little boxy/baggy like I said. I may have been able to size down. Overall, I do like it, and I'm excited to wear it with jeans, colored pants, leggings, at home, to work, etc. when the weather gets cooler!

My wife says this sweater is so soft and cozy. Love the black and white pattern and the fit is a bit loose which she likes. It will keep you warm in winter and has a mock neck. The stitching is on the outside which is a style and not a problem at all.  The only weird thing about the one she got was that each sleeve was different. On one side the stitching was white and obvious and the other it was more closely stitched together. A bit inconsistent in the stitching from sleeve to sleeve.
Chic classy timeless good closet staple

I love the outside/inside look. This one is well done and even the inside looks great if you just cut the tag off.. The sweater is super soft and fairly heavy. Sweater is warm and has some stretch. The material is very nice and it is well made. I love the blues together, makes it bright and bold. I feel it fits true to size. I ordered my normal size of large and it fits great. I can wear a thin t-shirt underneath if I wanted to as well. Cant wait to wear this in the fall and winter months!

This is a bit oversized and the fit is boxy but this is a nice sweater. The colors are rich and gorgeous. The hem hits just above my widest part (low hip) and it's soft and cozy. The knit is mid to heavy weight and the sleeves are a little long on me but I have short arms. I really like this sweater, it tucks in nicely too. For reference I am 5'5 and 170lbs with a medium build and hourglass shape (41,31,43) 36DD and 55 yo

评论用户: A reader, a crafter, a gardener and cook
评论详情: I would have really liked this as it's soft and comfy and I love the length as I'm petite. But mine was sewn inside out and not wearable.  When I took it out of the bag I noticed a thick seam on the sleeves and first thought it was an intentional detail that I had overlooked (PHOTO). But then I realized what was going on....it was sewn/tagged backwards. For the tags to be inside, the seams are then outside and vice versa. If I turn it inside out so that the seams are inside, the tags show. In the photo of my shoulder and mirror you can see that the shoulder seam is flat but behind me the tag shows.  I'm reasonable enough to know that someone in the factory just had a bad day and it was a fluke I got it so not holding anyone else responsible.

评论概述: Very soft and very thick sweater, love this one!
评论详情: When I pulled the sweater out of the packaging I was immediately struck by two things.  How very soft it is, and how nice and thick it is.  I love pink so I went with the pink and white, it is really a pretty color!  The sweater will pair well with just about anything, jeans, leggings.  The quality is great, I love this sweater!

very good and cozy fit. my only complaint is that the way the shirt is made confuses me a bit, its like half of it was sewn INSIDE-OUT and the other half was sewn correctly. thats the only thing i really dislike and yes it is noticeable. its like wearing the sweater inside out.
This sweater feels so soft and cozy on the skin. It doesn’t feel like an Amazon sweater and the stitching, fabric and stripes are all wonderfully done. Not too oversized but it offers some room.
Oversized design conception, that still fits; gorgeous colors; soft feel; 100% synthetic materials; covers hips in the back; seams are sewn inside out on purpose

These are my daughter's favorite clothing colors, so I had to order it. It's really pretty. It fits as you'd expect it to from the picture, so don't size up if you want it slightly oversized. It's also nice-feeling fabric and the arms are long enough.

评论概述: Free People vibes. Super soft, medium weight sweater
评论详情: This Dokotoo sweater is so nice! I sized up one size to get an oversized look. It has a high crewneck collar, boxy bottom and outer stitching, getting Free People vibes. It is soft and warm, a medium-weighted sweater. It arrives with no strange odors, thank you Dokotoo for this. All clothes should come without strange odors! It really is a great quality sweater and I would buy it again.

This is a review of Dokotoo Sweater for Women 2024 Long Sleeve Tops Lightweight Sweaters Casual Trendy Sweater Color Block Stripe Pullover.  This is a great sweater. The fibers are so soft. The neckline is a bit of a mock neck, but it doesn't go high on the neck at all. It felt very spongy and light and easy to pull on. Once on, it seemed very warm despite being so lightweight. I like the color -- the ivory is not too yellow, but not a bright white.  One detail I didn't notice till I saw it in person is that the seams are on the outside of the garment. It took my off guard when I opened the package, but for a cozy, oversized sweater, this casual touch seems appropriate.  It's too hot to wear this sweater right now, but it will be the first one I wear when the temperatures cool down later this year.
